commit.message: "Bug 1298345 - Refactor CanvasRenderingContext2D's texture allocation code. r=Bascf382f1"

diff:
"cf382f1 b=367829, another trivial fix after the original patch...
diff --git a/widget/src/gtk2/nsDeviceContextSpecG.cpp b/widget/src/gtk2/nsDeviceContextSpecG.cpp
index 4cf551f..bb23fb7 100644
--- a/widget/src/gtk2/nsDeviceContextSpecG.cpp
+++ b/widget/src/gtk2/nsDeviceContextSpecG.cpp
@@ -413,7 +413,7 @@ NS_IMETHODIMP nsDeviceContextSpecGTK::GetSurfaceForPrinter(gfxASurface **aSurfac
   DO_PR_DEBUG_LOG(("\"%s\", %f, %f\n", path, width, height));
 
   nsresult rv = NS_ERROR_FAILURE;
-#ifndef MOZ_ENABLE_POSTSCRIPT
+#ifdef MOZ_ENABLE_POSTSCRIPT
   rv = nsPrintJobFactoryGTK::CreatePrintJob(this, mPrintJob);
 #endif
   if (NS_FAILED(rv))
